attributes.action: use all political means possible to put pressure on the international community, especially the Kosovan Government, to relocate the Roma population currently inhabiting refugee camps built on contaminated land in Northern Kosova.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the level of lead in the childrens' blood so high medical instruments cannot measure it the British Government and the United Nations must act now to protect the lives and futures of this community.  The United Nations must not be allowed to fall short of the promises made 10 years ago when the camps were first built.
